release.change: [Updated] Transparency: Location update messages are more accurate and prominent
Fixed a bug where setting location services to "gps only" would not enable location updates
[Updated] Dark theme preference: moved to three dot menu
Fixed a bug where disabling app monitoring (Pause in secure apps) would not apply until Red Moon was killed and restarted.
[New] Choose how hardware buttons are dimmed
[New] Notification shows when Red Moon is paused in a secure app
Fixed a bug where the filter wouldn't automatically turn on/off (#126)
[Updated] Toggle Red Moon: floating button -> top switch
[New] Use GPS on devices without a network location provider
Fixed a bug where closing the app would cancel searching for location
[Updated] Secure apps: added new version of package installer
[New] Notify other apps when Red Moon toggles (details on the about page).
[Backend] Code converted from Java to Kotlin
[Backend] Lots of code cleanup and small bugfixes
